text:
Apple ID replaced with someone else's after iOS 6 upgrade (Security breach)

I just updated my iPad retina (3rd generation) with iOS 6 and now my Apple ID
has been replaced with someone else's ID.

iTunes Settings

And its not jailbroken either. How did someone manage to do that? This is a
serious security breach, I think.

I logged out of that Apple ID but how can I be sure that they are not tracking
anything and won't be able to purchase through my account?
